name: product-comparison-form
title: Product Comparison Form
description: Component used to render a form in the product comparison page

userSessionApi.title: User Session Api (GET)
userSessionApi.description: Set endpoint for the API call used to retrieve user session info, this is useful to know if user is logged in (i.e write something like this: /_v/wrapper/api/user/newsletteroptin).

endpoint.title: Endpoint
endpoint.description: Set the endpoint of the Api call

newsletterSubscribeApi.title: Newsletter Subscribe Api (POST)
newsletterSubscribeApi.description: Set endpoint and body (if you want to change it) for the API call that subscribe user to newsletter and create an account for it in VTEX (i.e write something like this: /_v/wrapper/api/user?userId=true).

endpoint.title: Endpoint
endpoint.description: Set the endpoint of the Api call

bodyKeys.title: Body Keys
bodyKeys.description: Set the body keys of the Api call

name.title: Name key
name.description: Set the key for 'name' value in the body of the API call

surname.title: Surname key
surname.description: Set the key for 'surname' value in the body of the API call

email.title: Email key
email.description: Set the key for 'email' value in the body of the API call

campaign.title: Campaign key
campaign.description: Set the key for 'campaign' value in the body of the API call

optin.title: Optin key
optin.description: Set the key for 'optin' value in the body of the API call

userInfoApi.title: User Info Api (GET)
userInfoApi.description: Set endpoint for the API call used to retrieve user info basing on user email (i.e write something like this: /_v/wrapper/api/user/email/userinfo?email=).

endpoint.title: Endpoint
endpoint.description: Set the endpoint of the Api call

newsletterOptinApi.title: Newsletter Subscribe Api (PATCH)
newsletterOptinApi.description: Set endpoint for the API call that set 'isNewsletterOptin' to true to user that has already an account in VTEX (i.e write something like this: /_v/wrapper/api/user/newsletteroptin).

endpoint.title: Endpoint
endpoint.description: Set the endpoint of the Api call

bodyKeys.title: Body Keys
bodyKeys.description: Set the body keys of the Api call

optin.title: Optin
optin.description: Set the key for 'optin' value in the body of the API call (usually is 'isNewsletterOptin').

comparisonSubscribeApi.title: Comparison Subscribe Api (POST)
comparisonSubscribeApi.description: Set endpoint and body (if you want to change it) for the API call that subscribe user to comparison and send it email with comparison (i.e write something like this: /app/sfmc/productsComparison).

endpoint.title: Endpoint
endpoint.description: Set the endpoint of the Api call

bodyKeys.title: Body Keys
bodyKeys.description: Set the body keys of the Api call

firstName.title: First Name
firstName.description: Set the key for 'firstName' value in the body of the API call.

lastName.title: Last Name
lastName.description: Set the key for 'lastName' value in the body of the API call.

email.title: Email
email.description: Set the key for 'email' value in the body of the API call.

skuIds.title: Sku Ids
skuIds.description: Set the key for 'skuIds' value in the body of the API call.

specificationsAvoided.title: Specifications Avoided
specificationsAvoided.description: Set the key for 'specificationsAvoided' value in the body of the API call.
